tool_description: Analyzes text content to identify and extract mentions of specified keywords, brands, or phrases with context and frequency counts.

text_content.description: Array of text strings to analyze for keyword mentions

keywords.description: Array of keywords or phrases to search for

case_sensitive.description: Whether keyword matching should be case sensitive

context_length.description: Number of characters around keyword to include as context (10-200)

error_messages: Empty content array: text_content array cannot be empty
Empty keywords array: keywords array cannot be empty
Context length out of range: context_length must be between 10 and 200 characters
Too many keywords: Maximum 50 keywords allowed per request
Content array too large: Maximum 1000 text items allowed per request
usage: Provide an array of text content and keywords to search for. Optionally configure case sensitivity and context length. Returns mention counts and contexts for each keyword.

total_mentions.description: Total number of keyword mentions found

keyword_counts.description: Array of mention counts for each keyword

mention_contexts.description: Array of text contexts where keywords were found

text_indices.description: Array of indices indicating which text contained each mention
